definitions.definition: place or fix (equipment or machinery) in position ready for use.
examples: we're planning to install a new shower
synonyms: lodge; insert "a photocopier was installed in the office"

examples: you may want to install a new version of the program

definitions.definition: place (someone) in a new position of authority, especially with ceremony.
examples: he was installed as music director at the Cathedral of St. Barbara in Cracow
synonyms: crown "the college installs its new president this afternoon"

definitions.definition: establish (someone) in a new place, condition, or role.
examples: Ashley installed herself behind her table
synonyms: park "she installed herself behind the table"
